overview:
You can use Cool Mojito to easily build professional Facebook pages for your business with no technical experience, for free.

Cool Mojito was created to help businesses build their online presence and acquire new customers and leads with Facebook, Twitter and Linkedin. The product makes it extremely easy for anyone to build a professional Facebook page, market and promote their business or brand on the leading social media websites, and acquire new leads and customers.

The product comes with a WYSIWYG drag and drop interface and dozens of professionally designed templates to allow non technical users to create their Facebook pages. You can also create store fronts to monetize your Facebook page and campaigns to build a leads database using your Facebook page. You can easily create pages with rich text, banners & images, videos, maps, audio, games, storefront, sweepstakes, contests, contact forms, leads database and more. It’s Multilingual & scalable.

In august 2012 Coolmojito.com has launched a new way for businesses, organizations and entrepreneurs to capitalize on social media. The new Reseller program allows entrepreneurs, businesses and other organizations the ability to completely re-brand the CoolMojito platform with their logos, colors, and branding in order to provide social media solutions to their customers or members. With the Reseller program, the entire Cool Mojito platform is 100% white-labeled. Resellersâ€™ customers will only see the reseller branding with no trace of the Cool Mojito branding anywhere on the site. Pages created by resellers or their customers only carry the logos, banners, links and branding of the reseller, not of Cool Mojito.
